title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 72.11 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 72.11 - Reports

State Regulations
(a) Program
contractors shall provide periodic and annual reports, as applicable, regarding
the project, at such time and in such manner as prescribed by the
commissioner. (b) Program
contractors shall notify the commissioner, on a timely basis, of the receipt of

Federal and/or other financial assistance for the project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
72.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
